text: ymphoma    Treatment options for newly diagnosed diffuse large B-cell lymphoma may include:            -  Surgery to remove as much of the tumor as possible, followed by combination chemotherapy.     - Combination chemotherapy.     - Combination chemotherapy and targeted therapy (rituximab).
